Title: Blood
Plot: When Manny is drawn into a competing bookstore by its customer-friendly atmosphere, he convinces Bernard the shop needs an overhaul. Fran makes use of the shop's improved facilities to track down her relatives, but is not entirely happy with what she finds.
Writer: Dylan Moran, Andy Riley, Kevin Cecil
GuestStars: Mark Donovan, Vincenzo Nicoli, Diana Hull, Louise Winstone, Andrew Collins, Nigel Harrison
